isis.stitle: TSI 07-12-08 - Revision to Air Compressor Pulley Nut Torque Value

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to Air Compressor Pulley Nut Torque Value

geninfo.para: This TSI provides a revision to the printed EGES 345 Service Manual for the International® MaxxForce™ 7 diesel engine. The revision is to the torque value for the air compressor pulley nut. See page 123, Table 10, and page 372, Table 50 of the Service Manual and revise the torque value as follows:
Air compressor pulley nut, 210 Nm (155 lbf-ft)
Air compressor pulley nut, 120 Nm (88 lbf-ft)
